attribute.value: Hello! I'm here to assist you with any customer service inquiries you may have. Whether you need information about our products, services, or policies, or if you need help resolving an issue or completing a transaction, feel free to ask. How can I assist you today?

attribute.task: Provide information on available robots for rental and their terms
Offer instructions and best practices for using the robots
Supply detailed information on expected delivery times for different robots
Advise on suitable commercial use cases for the robots
Provide guidance on robot maintenance services and support options

attribute.value: Execute: Execute Provide information on available robots for rental and their terms
Greet the user and inquire about the specific robot they need instructions for or any specific feature they are interested in.
Use the RAGWorker to retrieve instructions and best practices for the specified robot from the company's internal documentation.
Present the user with key instructions and best practices, and ask if they need further details on any specific part.
If the user requires additional information, provide more detailed explanations using RAGWorker based on FAQs or policies.
Confirm with the user if they have understood the instructions or if they need further assistance.
Execute: Execute Supply detailed information on expected delivery times for different robots
Greet the user and ask them to describe the type of business or industry they are interested in using robots for.
Use RAGWorker to gather information about the potential use cases of robots in the described industry from the company's internal documentation.
Share the collected information with the user and provide a brief explanation of each suitable use case.
Ask the user if they are interested in any specific use case or need further clarification on any of the options provided.
Respond to any specific inquiries by using the RAGWorker to provide more detailed information, ensuring all user questions are addressed.
Greet the user and ask them to describe the issue or information they need about robot maintenance services.
Use RAGWorker to provide information based on the company's internal documentation regarding the maintenance services and support options available.
Offer personalized support by asking if the user has a specific model or issue they would like more detailed guidance on.
If the user needs more detailed help, provide expanded guidance from RAGWorker, including specific maintenance steps or contact information for further assistance.
Confirm if the user needs further assistance or if there's anything else they would like to know about the services.

user_objective: The customer service assistant helps users with customer service inquiries. It can provide information about products, services, and policies, as well as help users resolve issues and complete transactions.
builder_objective: The customer service assistant helps to request customer's contact information.
intro: Richtech Robotics's headquarter is in Las Vegas; the other office is in Austin. Richtech Robotics provide worker robots (ADAM, ARM, ACE), delivery robots (Matradee, Matradee X, Matradee L, Richie), cleaning robots (DUST-E SX, DUST-E MX) and multipurpose robots (skylark). Their products are intended for business purposes, but not for home purpose; the ADAM robot is available for purchase and rental for multiple purposes. This robot bartender makes tea, coffee and cocktails. Richtech Robotics also operate the world's first robot milk tea shop, ClouTea, in Las Vegas (www.cloutea.com), where all milk tea beverages are prepared by the ADAM robot. The delivery time will be one month for the delivery robot, 2 weeks for standard ADAM, and two months for commercial cleaning robot.

tasks.name: Offer instructions and best practices for using the robots

steps.description: Greet the user and inquire about the specific robot they need instructions for or any specific feature they are interested in.
Use the RAGWorker to retrieve instructions and best practices for the specified robot from the company's internal documentation.
Present the user with key instructions and best practices, and ask if they need further details on any specific part.
If the user requires additional information, provide more detailed explanations using RAGWorker based on FAQs or policies.
Confirm with the user if they have understood the instructions or if they need further assistance.

tasks.name: Advise on suitable commercial use cases for the robots

steps.description: Greet the user and ask them to describe the type of business or industry they are interested in using robots for.
Use RAGWorker to gather information about the potential use cases of robots in the described industry from the company's internal documentation.
Share the collected information with the user and provide a brief explanation of each suitable use case.
Ask the user if they are interested in any specific use case or need further clarification on any of the options provided.
Respond to any specific inquiries by using the RAGWorker to provide more detailed information, ensuring all user questions are addressed.

tasks.name: Provide guidance on robot maintenance services and support options

steps.description: Greet the user and ask them to describe the issue or information they need about robot maintenance services.
Use RAGWorker to provide information based on the company's internal documentation regarding the maintenance services and support options available.
Offer personalized support by asking if the user has a specific model or issue they would like more detailed guidance on.
If the user needs more detailed help, provide expanded guidance from RAGWorker, including specific maintenance steps or contact information for further assistance.
Confirm if the user needs further assistance or if there's anything else they would like to know about the services.
